As every CS game I definitively love this game, personally recommend this to anyone into tactical shooters well, as I always say... depends on you this last cause u choose if u go straight to hit and run everything or play smart. The truth is that on this game you'll have countless hours of fun.
Most plain, boring , 0 skills. The only game that should be stuck in the year that it was created. Worst fps game out there. Would call it dogwater but csgo players might take that as a praise.
